title: IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Engineer Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the ...
